content: **ps ⭐️ i m a season 8 knit star ⭐️ shop this season s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 here 1 ** a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 2 inspired by my favorite character from the babysitter s club this funky multi-color pullover is definitely a statement piece the open grid-like construction keeps this crochet sweater airy and drapey while the bulky weight yarn makes it a quick and easy project shop the full kit here 3 **sizes** sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl suggested ease 10-12 /25 5-30 5cm pictured in a size s on model
